name: Stahlregen - Spreading Meadows

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000

shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=warp = 0.075;
per_frame_2=//warp_scale = .02+.05*treb_att;
per_frame_3=dy = 0.001;
per_pixel_1=sx = 1+.05*y+.001*bass_att;
per_pixel_2=sy = 1-.01*y+.001*treb_att;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`   // sample previous frame
warp_5=`
warp_6=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main,lerp(uv,uv_orig,.15));
warp_7=`
warp_8=`//float2 reuv = uv+float2(2,4)*texsize.zw*GetPixel(uv).x;
warp_9=`float2 gruv1 = uv+float2(5,.25)*texsize.zw*GetPixel(uv).y;
warp_10=`float2 gruv2 = uv+float2(-5,-.25)*texsize.zw*GetPixel(uv).y;
warp_11=`//float2 bluv = uv+float2(0,-20)*texsize.zw*GetPixel(uv).z;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`//ret.x += GetPixel(reuv).x-GetBlur1(reuv).x;
warp_14=`ret.y += max(GetPixel(gruv1).y-1.7*GetBlur1(gruv1).y,GetPixel(gruv2).y-1.7*GetBlur1(gruv2).y);
warp_15=`//ret.z += GetPixel(bluv).z-.5*GetBlur2(bluv).z;
warp_16=`
warp_17=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_18=`//    ret = (ret*0.98)-.002; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_19=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`ret = GetPixel(uv);
comp_4=`ret.xz = 0;
comp_5=`ret.z += lerp(lerp(0,.7,lerp(0,ret.y,uv.x)),lerp(0,.7,lerp(0,ret.y,1-uv.x)),uv.x);
comp_6=`ret.x += lerp(0,.4,lerp(0,ret.y,1-uv.y));
comp_7=`}
